Control Groups Finding

utility.find_control.find_control(taintedtx, target_list, search_type, value, limit_option, input_count, output_count, value_range=0.1, case_name=None)[source]

Find transaction control groups.

Parameters

  • taintedtx – TaintedTX object.

  • target_list – List of targeted addresss or transactions.

  • search_type – ‘tx’ for transaction search and ‘adr’ for address search.

  • value – Transaction value criterion in smallest unit.

  • limit_option – day number limit in np.datetime64 e.g., np.timedelta64(10, ‘D’)

  • input_count – Transaction input number criterion.

  • output_count – Transaction output number criterion.

  • value_range – Range of acceptable transaction value.

  • case_name – Name of the case used for saving into file.

Returns

DataFrame with list of potential transaction control groups.
